credit_line: Museum purchase through the gift of Mary A. Hearn, William Hindley, R.H. Hunt, James Hazen Hyde, Mrs. Richard Irvin, and Mrs. Talbot J. Taylor
title: Hanging lamp
description: Glass hanging lamp in the form of a many-pointed star, the points of varying lengths. Each point cut and etched with angular geometric patterns. Housed in a metal strapwork frame suspended from a metal chain.
name: Hanging lamp
